description:
Learn how to build an online forum in less than 1 hour!!!

Have you ever wanted to build an online forum and start a new community of discussions on whatever topic you wanted? Well now you can.

In this course I will give you the tools to create an online forum within 1 hour or less. I give out tips and tricks on setting up your forum and the best possible methods to set it up.

What You Get:

  • Easy to follow, step by step instructions.
  • Online forum Software (MyBB)
  • Bunch of (MyBB) themes and designs
  • Personal Contact With Me
  • 7 Days a Week Programming Support & Help

What will I need for this course?

I will be showing you how to get a cheap domain name the best and cheapest unlimited web hosting to develop your online forum site. The forum software is free and does not need to be bought.

My Goal For You:

By the end of this course my goal is for you to understand how to develop & build an online forum. Your site should be operational and customized to your liking by the end of the course.

Problems?

If you have problems following any of the lectures, let me know and I'll try to set up a live Q&A session to guide you through.

Need Additional Help?

If you are still struggling throughout the course I will personally help you to make sure you complete the course and fully understand everything as well as help you get your site up and running.
title: Build an online forum in less than 1 hour
